review_text: A wonderful stay at this hotel! The staff was friendly, and the room was clean and comfortable. Highly recommended!
Great location, and the hotel has a fantastic view of the city. The breakfast was delicious!
I had a pleasant stay. The room was spacious, and the staff was attentive to my needs.
The hotel was disappointing. The room was not as clean as expected, and the service was slow.
I had an amazing time at this hotel. The pool and spa facilities were outstanding!
Overall, it was a pleasant experience. The hotel's restaurant had great food options.
